00043 // ===========================================================================
00044 // method definitions
00045 // ===========================================================================
00046 ROJTRRouter::ROJTRRouter(RONet& net, bool unbuildIsWarningOnly, bool acceptAllDestinations,
00047                          int maxEdges, bool ignoreClasses, bool allowLoops)
00048     : myNet(net), myUnbuildIsWarningOnly(unbuildIsWarningOnly),
00049       myAcceptAllDestination(acceptAllDestinations), myMaxEdges(maxEdges),
00050       myIgnoreClasses(ignoreClasses), myAllowLoops(allowLoops) {
00051 }
00052 
00053 
00054 ROJTRRouter::~ROJTRRouter() {}
00055 
00056 
00057 void
00058 ROJTRRouter::compute(const ROEdge* from, const ROEdge* /*to*/,
00059                      const ROVehicle* const vehicle,
00060                      SUMOTime time, std::vector<const ROEdge*> &into) {
00061     const ROJTREdge* current = static_cast<const ROJTREdge*>(from);
00062     // route until a sinks has been found
00063     while (current != 0
00064             &&
00065             current->getType() != ROEdge::ET_SINK
00066             &&
00067             (int) into.size() < myMaxEdges) {
00068 
00069         into.push_back(current);
00070         time += (SUMOTime) current->getTravelTime(vehicle, time);
00071         current = current->chooseNext(myIgnoreClasses ? 0 : vehicle, time);
00072         assert(myIgnoreClasses || current == 0 || !current->prohibits(vehicle));
00073     }
00074     // check whether no valid ending edge was found
00075     if ((int) into.size() >= myMaxEdges) {
00076         if (myAcceptAllDestination) {
00077             return;
00078         } else {
00079             MsgHandler* mh = 0;
00080             if (myUnbuildIsWarningOnly) {
00081                 mh = MsgHandler::getWarningInstance();
00082             } else {
00083                 mh = MsgHandler::getErrorInstance();
00084             }
00085             mh->inform("The route starting at edge '" + from->getID() + "' could not be closed.");
00086         }
00087     }
00088     // append the sink
00089     if (current != 0) {
00090         into.push_back(current);
00091     }
00092 }
00093 
00094 
00095 SUMOReal
00096 ROJTRRouter::recomputeCosts(const std::vector<const ROEdge*> &edges, const ROVehicle* const v, SUMOTime time) const {
00097     SUMOReal costs = 0;
00098     for (std::vector<const ROEdge*>::const_iterator i = edges.begin(); i != edges.end(); i++) {
00099         /*
00100         if (PF::operator()(*i, v)) {
00101             return -1;
00102         }
00103         */
00104         costs += (*i)->getTravelTime(v, time);
00105     }
00106     return costs;
00107 }
